questionText: Which Disney film's opening sequence features a book that opens to reveal illuminated pages?
The song 'Let It Go' from Frozen was originally written for a villain.
Which Disney character was originally going to be named Mortimer?
The original concept for EPCOT (Experimental Prototype Community of Tomorrow) was for it to be an actual city where people would live and work.
What was the code name for Disney's Animal Kingdom during its development?
In the Marvel Comics universe, which of these mutants is classified as an Omega-level mutant?
In the original Marvel Comics, Thanos was motivated to collect the Infinity Stones to impress Death, who he was in love with.
Which Marvel superhero was created first chronologically?
The original Spider-Woman (Jessica Drew) was created primarily to secure a trademark rather than as a character for storytelling.
What is the name of the symbiote that first bonded with Spider-Man before bonding with Eddie Brock to become Venom?
The Star Wars sound effect for TIE Fighters was created by combining an elephant call with a car driving on wet pavement.
What is the name of Boba Fett's ship in Star Wars canon before it was renamed?
The character Grand Admiral Thrawn first appeared in a Star Wars novel before appearing in any visual media.
Which actor portrayed both a clone trooper and Jango Fett in the Star Wars prequel trilogy?
The 'Wilhelm Scream' sound effect appears in all Star Wars movies directed by George Lucas.
What was the original title of Pixar's 'Monsters, Inc.' during development?
The Luxo Jr. lamp in the Pixar logo was the subject of Pixar's first short film.
Which Pixar film was originally conceptualized as a direct-to-video sequel?
The character Carl Fredricksen in 'Up' was partially modeled after Spencer Tracy.
What is the name of the ship in 'WALL-E' that holds the remnants of humanity?
The name 'Ganon' was used before 'Ganondorf' in the Zelda series.
In which Zelda game did Dark Link first appear?
options: Zelda II: The Adventure of Link
correctAnswer: Zelda II: The Adventure of Link

questionText: The final boss in 'Majora's Mask' is a giant version of the mask itself.
Which of these Zelda games does NOT feature the Master Sword?
In 'Breath of the Wild', Link's Divine Beast is named Vah Link.
